title: QU4RTZ Live - Day 2!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Yesterday’s concert was so awesome......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s all thanks to QU4RTZ’s leader, Kasumi-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Mhmm. Kasumi-chan, you’re so reliable.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah! I think so, too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Huh......? No, there were some moments when Kasumin relied on Kanata-senpai and Emma-senpai and Rinako, too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooh, really? I’m happy to hear that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That’s embarrassing. Rina-chan Board says, “Blush.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I guess, umm...... Everybody was leading QU4RTZ? But isn’t that kinda weird...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Then, should I lead QU4RTZ for a change...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Let’s just keep having everyone lead QU4RTZ!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
